Posts.Content: Sep 16, 2018 06:56AM eulainemc wrote: It's been a few years since your post, but I'm concerned about the estrogen mimics too. Any more info. to share since 2012? I'm only 2 months out from finishing chemo and only lost brows and lashes after my last chemo. So tired of drawing on brows, which rubs off too easily. Hoping to hear back.
